entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `Exists` and `ExistsAsync` like `Find` and `FindAsync` #31203
  • Json: BigModel_with_JSON_columns test fails to find JsonValueReaderWriter when processing compiled model #31201
  • Optimize JsonScalarExpression within OpenJson/json_each #31200
    Backlog
  • #"if" level designation #31199
  • work with timespan and compare them #31196
  • How to use dotnet required keyword and [key] attribute together? #31195
  • Install Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer into project .NET 7 error #31194

Closed

  • Silent data loss when adding objects to an sqlite DB with PRAGMA journal_mode=DELETE in a multi-threaded environment. #30851
    6.0.20
  • Scaffolding synapse fails when attempting to enumerate triggers #30998
    7.0.10
  • Optimized translation for indexing of JSON primitive collections #30724
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when using JSON columns with database provider that does not support them (e.g. SQLite, MySQL) #29738
  • Querying an entity, that has previously been updated using Attach, using Include does not include the entity #31183
  • Documentation: Update code snippets in README files with `using` declarations (without braces) #31088
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #31202
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.21
  • [manual] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/7.0' #31198
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 7.0.10
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31193
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Documentation: Use `using` declarations in README files #31089
    community-contribution
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.34.0 to 3.35.1 #31165
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • update SDK to nightly #31188

Updated

  • Fix to #30604 - Implement JSON serialization/deserialization via Utf8JsonReader/Utf8JsonWriter #31160
  • Add complex property support to relational model #31174
